## MissingReleaseTagRuleOptions.severity property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Severity level for missing release tags. - 'error': Report as error - 'warning': Report as warning (default) - 'none': Disable the check

**Signature:**

```typescript
severity?: ApiExtractorLogLevel;
```
